author: Simon Difford
description: A slightly pink, dry, spicy long drink with rum and a hint of cloves and lime.
name: Adelaide Swizzle
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and half fill with crushed ice
SWIZZLE with a swizzle stick (or churn with a barspoon)
Add more crushed ice to fill and SWIZZLE some more
